creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
kyo_ka poem
\"Harukaze no 
Chikaradameshi ya
Isamashiku
Yanagi wo yusuru
Ume no hana osho_\"

As spring wind is trying its strength,
Plum-blossom monk violently is shaking a willow tree.

by Edo Shigaraki Kacho_ya Noriyasu
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Suikoden and the Five Elements (Suiko gogyō 水滸五行)
title: Wood: Lu Zhishen
